Package com.backbase.interview.course.controller

Class CourseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.backbase.interview.course.controller.CourseController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/courses")
public class CourseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class with different methods to execute during different REST API calls.

    • Method Detail

      • createCourse

        @PostMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> createCourse​(@RequestBody
                                                                              CourseEntity courseEntity)
        Method that gets executed during a POST /courses call.
        Parameters:
        courseEntity - - CourseEntity object.
        Returns:
        HTTP status code 201 with CourseEntity object as body if a course is created successfully. Else return HTTP status code 400.

      • getCourseByTitle

        @GetMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getCourseByTitle​(@RequestParam(name="q")
                                                                                  java.lang.String title)
        Method that gets executed during GET /courses?q={title} call.
        Parameters:
        title - - String object.
        Returns:
        HTTP status code 200 with CourseEntity object as body if a course having the specified title is available. Else return HTTP status 404.

      • getCourseById

        @GetMapping("/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getCourseById​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                                               java.lang.Long id)
        Method that gets executed during GET /courses/{id} call.
        Parameters:
        id - - Long object.
        Returns:
        HTTP status code 200 with CourseEntity object as body if a course having the specified id is available. Else return HTTP status 404.

      • signUpForCourse

        @PostMapping("/{id}/add")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> signUpForCourse​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                                                 java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                                 ParticipantEntity participantEntity)
        Method that gets executed during GET /courses/{id}/add call.
        Parameters:
        id - - Long object.
        participantEntity - - ParticipantEntity object.
        Returns:
        HTTP status code 200 with CourseEntity object as body if a participant is created successfully under the course with the specified id. If the course with the specified id is not available return HTTP status code 404. HTTP status code 400 is returned if the request body is invalid.

      • cancelUserFromCourse

        @PostMapping("/{id}/remove")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> cancelUserFromCourse​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                                                      java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                      @RequestBody
                                                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> participantEntity)
        Method that gets executed during POST /course/{id}/remove call.
        Parameters:
        id - - Long object.
        participantEntity - - ParticipantEntity object.
        Returns:
        HTTP status code 200 with CourseEntity object as body if a participant is removed successfully from the course with the specified id. If the course with the specified id is not available return HTTP status code 404. HTTP status code 400 is returned if the request body is invalid.
